reviewText: Glad that I was finally able to get one on blu-ray
Excellent review of the domination which was Marc Marquez
Excellent coverage and commentary as usual. This series has never disappointed.
you have to be into racing at its best to love this

I was disappointed in video. There were scenes of all the races but I would have also liked to have seen some interviews with the top 3 finishers after each race and/or the race teams to hear what the major issues were. There was no behind the scenes or after race discussions so I wouldn't recommend it.
Terrific season. Can't wait to purchase the 2015 review in blu ray.
Awesome DVD wish it had all the races from Moto 3 and up
Fantastic race footage and great track intros- just what I wanted.
Excellent. What is there not to like about sit on the edge of your chair racing.
